attributes.description: MyRide will find the ride of your dreams, supported by exceptional customer service and countrywide delivery of all our new and pre-owned vehicles. Our team has decades of experience in the automotive industry and represents some of the greatest brands in the world. For your peace of mind, we pay attention to the smallest details to provide you with quality vehicles that keep you and your family safe. Our skilled sales staff provide excellent customer service, whilst our in-house finance experts ensure you get the best offer to suit your budget. We encourage test drives and welcome all trade-ins. Contact us today to find your ride with MyRide. We promise to make your vehicle purchasing experience seamless and convenient. *T’s & C’s apply and price excludes standard license, registration and delivery charges.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877215217. Vehicle comes with a styling pack worth R30 000. With a powerful 3.0 Turbo Diesel engine mated to a 6 speed automatic gearbox. Some of the awesome features include front and rear park distance control and reverse camera, auto lights and wipers, cruise control, Apple Car Play(wireless)/Android Auto, 9 inch touch screen infotainment system, 7 airbags, auto fold mirrors, smart keyless entry, 8 speaker sound system, Hill launch assist, hill decent control, LED lights with daytime running and rugged cloth seats. The .BT50 also comes with a 3 year unlimited mileage Service Plan, Warranty and Roadside Assistance as standard, with the option to extend.

The price excludes dealer fees and 35% LUMAR 100 Micron Smash and Grab Safety Film. Errors and omissions Reserved. T&Cs apply
